The claim was found in various versions: leading to different interpretations of its authenticity.
The person claiming ownership of the quo: T. Bubba Bechtol, is not a real person but a comedic persona of James Terryl Bechtol.
T: Bubba Bechtol stated on his website that he made the comment during a radio interview, but it is unclear if this interview actually took place.
The quote itself is a repositioning of a: 1990s about performing medical experiments on animals.
